word_mean: 帷幕：旨在封闭某一开放空间的覆盖物，尤指覆盖病床以便给氧或药物的蒸气吸入的帐幔
塞条：以棉绒或纱布之类软料制成的锥形塞条，有膨胀性，以扩张孔口，或保持创口开放，以利创口底部自下而上的愈合

sentence.Network_en: Small things stirred in the grass around the tent.
sentence.Network_cn: 一些小东西在帐篷四周的草丛里窸窸窣窣地动着。

sentence.Network_en: They ran to the center of the tent to take their bows.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们跑到帐篷中央鞠躬致意。

sentence.Network_en: Mom wants to know if you guys still have that two-person tent.
sentence.Network_cn: 妈妈想知道你们是否还有那顶双人帐篷。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French tente, based on Latin tent- 'stretched', from the verb tendere. The verb dates from the mid 16th cent
late Middle English: from Spanish tinto 'deep-coloured', from Latin tinctus 'dyed, stained', from the verb tingere
late Middle English (also denoting a surgical probe): from Old French tente, from tenter 'to probe', from Latin temptare 'handle, test, try'

entry.def: A tent is a shelter made of canvas or nylon which is held up by poles and ropes, and is used mainly by people who are camping.

means.word_mean: 1. a portable shelter (usually of canvas stretched over supporting poles and fastened to the ground with ropes and pegs);

sentences.sentence: "he pitched his tent near the creek"

means.word_mean: 1. live in or as if in a tent;

sentences.sentence: "Can we go camping again this summer?"
"The houseguests had to camp in the living room"

auth_sentence.content: We were selling cups of juice from our tent.
auth_sentence.res_content: We were selling cups of juice from our tent.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We were selling cups of juice from our tent.

auth_sentence.content: I've even gone without tent or sleeping bag.
auth_sentence.res_content: I've even gone without tent or sleeping bag.

auth_sentence.content: She says she thinks her tent was quite pretty.
auth_sentence.res_content: She says she thinks her tent was quite pretty.

stems_affixes.word_buile: at加强+tent伸展,趋向+ive……的→伸展出去的→注意的,有礼貌的
intention[n.意图,意向,目的]+al表形容词→adj.有意图的, 故意的
pre前+tent伸展,趋向+ious……的→提前摆出一种姿态→做作的
attentive[adj.注意的;有礼貌的]+ly表副词→adv.注意地, 留意地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 注意,注意力;立正;特别照顾;照料
stems_affixes.word_buile: at加强+tent伸展,趋向+ion表名词→伸展出去→注意;照料

stems_affixes.value_cn: 广度,宽度,长度;程度,限度
stems_affixes.word_buile: ex出+tent伸展,趋向→伸出去的范围→广度,宽度
intent[adj.目不转睛的,热切的 n.意图]+ion表名词→n.意图,意向,目的
tent伸展,趋向→伸展开用来遮雨,阳光等→帐篷

sentences.en: The children had a midnight feast in their tents.
sentences.cn: 孩子们半夜在帐篷里饱餐了一顿。

sentences.en: Put a tent over his legs to stop them being rubbed by the sheets.
sentences.cn: 给他的腿盖上罩子, 以免被床单摩擦。

jushi.chinese: 这种做帐篷的材料可以防水。

jushi.english: Put a tent over his legs to stop them being rubbed by the sheets.
jushi.chinese: 给他的腿换上罩子,以免被床单擦刮。

jushi.english: Jump to it, men, we must get all the tents packed in an hour!
jushi.chinese: 快点,弟兄们,我们得在一个钟头之内把帐篷收起来。
